oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Research to show the value of organic pork
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Aarhus, University
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Researchers from Aarhus University focus on meat and ethical quality in a research project which is to highlight the potentials and possibilities of free-range pig farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Meat, fish and Dairy processing industry latest news
